name: Pauchtlet: Cirrus' Staff
description:
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
   [Paunchtlet: Cirrus' Staff]

NartYear 2017
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Guide Vix "Mic" Vulp as he partakes in Cirrus' puzzles.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Use the {Mouse Right Button} to manipulate the active boxes so "Mic" can get through the puzzle.

Use the {Mouse Left Button} to release "Mic" from the warp boxes.

[Enter] activate pause and select options.

[Arrow Keys] cycle through options.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ 

Homepage
